text: Anguidae is a family of lizards. == Classification == Family Anguidae *Subfamily Anguinae **Genus Anguis **Genus Ophisaurus (glass lizards) **Genus Pseudopus *Subfamily Diploglossinae **Genus Celestus **Genus Diploglossus **Genus Ophiodes *Subfamily Gerrhonotinae **Genus Abronia **Genus Barisia **Genus Coloptychon **Genus Elgaria **Genus Gerrhonotus **Genus Mesaspis Category:Anguids
title: Anguidae
